text:
SANTA BARBARA, Calif. , Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Bottom Line Results LLC officially announced the launch of 10Rule® Workforce Performance Transformation Cloud, an all-new workforce analytics tool and human capital business intelligence solutions suite. Using disruptive technology, 10Rule® transforms human performance management into a viable strategic tool that unleashes the energy and power of workforces. Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150921/269086LOGO 
10Rule®'s patented Human Capital Performance Engine and Cogitative "smart software" solution suite helps global organizations increase workforce performance by sustainably replicating the top 10% performers through measuring, benching, hiring and developing all talent to consistently impact the bottom line. The suite provides advanced HR analytics, high-value HR Big Data and "smart capabilities" delivering high performance talent tools and solutions. 
"This expert systems performance management solution is not only transforming Human Resources, it allows C-level executives to capitalize soft-asset skills and deliver financial results," said Robert Morlot , 10Rule® Executive Vice President & Chief Sales Officer. "For the last decade there has been a relentless search for accessible, innovative technology applications to accelerate and manage Human Capital Performance. The quest to understand what drives performance in the workplace has given rise to the HR technology boom."
The product suite contains three features of focus. 
When hiring, the Applicant Performance Screening and Vetting Engine identifies top talent that match top performers in respective positions before even opening a resume. The Online Performance Coaching provides custom, clinically proven tools to increase employees' engagement and performance execution with even greater leadership capabilities within weeks. The Company Performance Audit provides a clear, company-wide snapshot of the overall performance health of an organization. This audit displays the top performers, areas of potential risk and hidden disasters as well as the levels of productivity the organization needs to achieve for maximum results. 10Rule® Workforce Performance Transformation Suite can be used as an online Cloud application or used is a simple plug-in (API) capable of upgrading HCM systems and transforming HR into strategic value creator. 
About 10Rule
Workforce Performance Transformation Suite unleashes the power and potential of any organization's global talent. At its core is a scientific performance diagnostic metric that is imbedded to drive the organization's 10Rule strategy with its "smart" solutions. 10Rule's enterprise software solution suite helps global organizations increase workforce performance by sustainably replicating the top 10% performers through measuring, benching, hiring, developing and auditing all talent productivity and its impact on bottom line results. 10Rule suite provides advanced HR analytics, high-value HR Big Data and delivers high performance talent development tools and solutions. Visit www.10Rule.com for more information and client case studies.
